div.p: The Assassin kills tons of people all the time.
But they do it with style.
Dead eyes, charming eyes, angry eyes
Black bodysuit, plain clothes, dirty rags
Buzz cut, elaborate hair, tattooed head
Slim body, athletic body, huge body
When you get close to your target to make a surprise attack, roll+DEX if you use stealth or speed, or roll+CHA if you use deception or charm. On a 10+ choose two. On a 7-9 choose one.

ul.li: You don't get into melee with them
You create an advantage, +1 forward to you or an ally acting on it
Reduce their armor by 1 until they repair it

div.p: Make a brutal show of a kill after the fact.
Take out a threat before it harms another.
Dispatch of an enemy before they know you're a threat.
Your load is 7+Str. You start with leather armor (1 armor, worn, 1 weight), field gear (1 weight), and field rations (5 uses, 1 weight). For your weapons choose one:

ul.li: Lasgun (near, far, long, 4 uses, 2 weight) and dagger (hand, 1 weight)
Laspistol (*near, far, 3 uses, 1 weight*) and Rapier (*close, precise, 1 weight*)

div.p: Fill in the name of one of your companions in at least one:
I have trusted _______________ with a secret about me. I should learn one about them
_______________ knows some tricks that could be useful to learn.
When you gain a level from 2-5, choose from these moves.
You have focused your training on either the blade or the rifle. Choose one:

ul.li: Blademaster: Once per encounter you may reroll one d6 of a Hack and Slash or Unsuspecting Strike roll
Sharpshooter: Once per encounter you may reroll one d6 of a Aim and Fire or Called Shot roll

div.p: When you gain a level from 6-10, choose from these moves or the level 2-5 moves.
